title: 6 rc2 cache/getmountpoint issue with shared folders
body:
os: debian
php:  5.5.6-1
 - open_basedir = disabled
 - disabled_functions = no
 - dependencies status = ok

apache: 2.4.6
mysql: 5.5.33
filesystem for /data: sshfs

i am using sshfs to connect to an external storage, mounted via fstab. the files are fully writable by the apache user.
turning on debugging doesn't yield any extra information.

this only occurs when accessing accounts that have folders that are shared by another account.
the error log also occurs when browsing the website, which correctly displays all files.
however the windows desktop client reports: csync failed to connect through a proxy. 500 internal server error

error log:
[mon dec 02 13:00:10.644411 2013] [:error] [pid 8678] [client <ip>:51877] fastcgi: server "/var/www-extra/fastcgi/php5.fastcgi" stderr: php message: php fatal error:  call to a member function getmountpoint() on a non-object in /var/www/<hostname>/www/owncloud/apps/files_sharing/lib/cache.php on line 50
